item.title: CVE-2023-5309|2024-09-04T19:03:16.727Z -- puppet -- puppet%20enterprise
item.description: Versions of Puppet Enterprise prior to 2021.7.6 and 2023.5Â contain a flaw which results in broken session management for SAML implementations.
